name: websharks/core
description: Core PHP library used by WebSharks, Inc.

suggest.ryakad/pandoc-php: 1.* :: Required by routines that use Pandoc.
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: 2.* :: Required by routines that make calls to the AWS API.
suggest.erusev/parsedown: 1.* :: Required by routines that convert Markdown.
suggest.erusev/parsedown-extra: 0.* :: Required by routines that convert Markdown.
suggest.michelf/php-markdown: 1.* :: Required by routines that convert Markdown.
suggest.symfony/yaml: 2.* :: Required by routines that convert YAML.
suggest.lusitanian/oauth: 0.* :: Required by routines that deal w/ oAuth.
suggest.corneltek/getoptionkit: 2.* :: Required for routines that parse CLI opts.
